Package org.lightsleep.connection

Classes that supply connection wrapper classes to this library using various connection pool libraries.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionSupplier
    The interface of the supplier of the connection wrappers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConnectionSupplier
    An abstract class implementing the intersection of connection wrapper suppliers.
    C3p0
    Gets connection wrappers using c3p0 JDBC Connection Pool.
    ConnectionWrapper
    Wraps java.sql.Connection.
    Dbcp
    Gets connection wrappers using Apache Commons DBCP 2.
    HikariCP
    Gets connection wrappers using HikariCP JDBC Connection Pool.
    Jdbc
    Gets connection wrappers using the DriverManager class.
    That refer to the following properties of lightsleep.properties file.
    Jndi
    Gets a data source using JNDI (Java Naming and Directory Interface) API.
    Refers to the following properties of lightsleep.properties file.
    TomcatCP
    Gets connection wrappers using Tomcat JDBC Connection Pool.
    That refer to the following properties of lightsleep.properties file.

Package org.lightsleep.connection Description

Classes that supply connection wrapper classes to this library using various connection pool libraries.
